assignments.reasoning: Logic 8.5 handles complex career strategy synthesis; Efficiency 9.5 keeps costs reasonable for multi-round career counseling sessions; native structured output ideal for producing formatted career profiles and action plans

SELF-VERIFYING, VISIBLE-COT perfect for skills gap analysis; Logic 9.0 for rigorous assessment of strengths, weaknesses, opportunities; chain-of-thought visibility shows exactly how career profile is being analyzed
Creative 7.5 + Logic 7.5 provides balanced strategic thinking; USER-ALIGNED, NON-SYCOPHANTIC gives honest career advice; Anti-Lecture trait means direct, actionable roadmaps not platitudes
